title: Meditation Tips - Chiropractic First

description: Back or neck pain? Call (847) 869-1313 This Evanston chiropractor uses gentle chiropractic therapy to end your neck or back pain fast.
cleaned_text: Listen to this grounding meditation by our Chiropractor, Dr. Will Vogds, as a gift to you. This [relaxation meditation](http://www.chiropractic1st.com/newwp/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/2016MeditationEDIT.mp3) features the soothing sounds of alpha waves, designed to help you into a deeper states of relaxation.
